plot outline: Bibaho Diaries is a romantic comedy about what a couple today looks like under a microscope before and after marriage - an account of all the hilarious things that bind them together and create complications amidst the amusing clashes of age-old tradition and new-age ways.
title: Bibaho Diaries
plot: Amidst the amusing clash of age-old traditions and new-age ways, a young couple inspects their relationship before and after marriage. Where will the new discoveries take the two?

_Bibaho Diaries_ (qv) is a romantic comedy about what a couple today looks like under a microscope before and after marriage - an account of all the hilarious things that bind them together and create complications amidst the amusing clashes of age-old tradition and new-age ways.
